WorkflowInfo.Name: Unlock locked users
WorkflowInfo.Description: Search for locked users and unlock them
WorkflowInfo.Xoml:
<SequentialWorkflowActivity x:Name="CustomWorkflow" xmlns:ns0="clr-namespace:ADListOU;Assembly=ADListOU, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns1="clr-namespace:ResultSetFilter;Assembly=ResultSetFilter, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns2="clr-namespace:GetRowsCount;Assembly=GetRowsCount, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns3="clr-namespace:ExitWhile;Assembly=ExitWhile, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns4="clr-namespace:GetCellValue;Assembly=GetCellValue, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns5="clr-namespace:ADIsAccountLocked;Assembly=ADIsAccountLocked, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns6="clr-namespace:ReturnValue;Assembly=ReturnValue, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns7="clr-namespace:ADUnlockAccount;Assembly=ADUnlockAccount, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns8="clr-namespace:SendEmail;Assembly=SendEmail, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns9="clr-namespace:ADGetProperty;Assembly=ADGetProperty, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns10="clr-namespace:SendSMS;Assembly=SendSMS, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns11="clr-namespace:Continue;Assembly=Continue, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:x="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml" xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/workflow" x:Class="WorkflowDesignerControl.CustomWorkflow"> <ns0:ADListOU IsValid="True" x:Name="adListOU1" HostName="AD-Server" TimeInSeconds="0" Timeout="00:01:00" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" DisplayName="AD List OU" Recursive="{x:Null}" Path="\Users" Password="" OUName="{x:Null}" Description="Active directory List OU." HostId="-2" TypeName="ADListOU" UserName="" /> <ns1:ResultSetFilter IsValid="True" x:Name="GetUsers" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Timeout="00:01:00" DisplayName="ResultSet Filter" VariableName="%adListOU1%" Description="Filter a Result Set" TypeName="ResultSetFilter" FilterStatement="type = "User"" /> <ns2:GetRowsCount IsValid="True" x:Name="TotalUsers" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" ResultSet="%GetUsers%" DisplayName="Get Rows Count" ResultSetName="GetUsers" Description="Gets the amount of rows in a resultset." TypeName="GetRowsCount" /> <WhileActivity x:Name="whileActivity1" Condition="{x:Null}"> <SequenceActivity x:Name="sequenceActivity1"> <ns3:ExitWhile IsValid="True" x:Name="exitWhile1" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Counter="%TotalUsers%" Description="Exit current while activity" DisplayName="Exit While" TypeName="ExitWhile" /> <ns4:GetCellValue ColumnType="Number" IsValid="True" x:Name="UserName" ColumnNumber="2" ResultSet="%GetUsers%" RowNumber="%exitWhile1%" ResultSetName="GetUsers" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Gets a specific cell value from a resultset." DisplayName="Get Cell Value" TypeName="GetCellValue" /> <ns5:ADIsAccountLocked IsValid="True" x:Name="adIsAccountLocked1" ADUserName="%UserName%" TimeInSeconds="0" Timeout="00:01:00" HostName="AD-Server" DisplayName="AD Is Account Locked" Path="DC=Ayehudc,DC=COM" Password="" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Active directory account lock check." HostId="-2" TypeName="ADIsAccountLocked" UserName="" /> <IfElseActivity x:Name="Check_User_Status"> <IfElseBranchActivity x:Name="User_Locked"> <ns6:ReturnValue Value="True" IsValid="True" x:Name="returnValue4" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" ConditionName="" UseBranchWhenTimeout="False" UseStoredValue="True" ConditionType="" DisplayName="Return Value" Formula="=Equals(&&&,True)" Description="Use a returned value of a previous activity." ConditionNumber="-1" UseCustomeCondition="False" Type="StoredValue" TypeName="ReturnValue" /> <ns7:ADUnlockAccount IsValid="True" x:Name="adUnlockAccount1" ADUserName="%UserName%" TimeInSeconds="0" Timeout="00:01:00" HostName="AD-Server" DisplayName="AD Unlock Account" Path="DC=Ayehu,DC=COM" Password="" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Active directory unlock account." HostId="-2" TypeName="ADUnlockAccount" UserName="" /> <ns8:SendEmail Channel="0" TimeInSeconds="0" Subject="User %UserName% has been unlocked" DestinationNumber="1" x:Name="sendEmail1" TemplateNumber="0" ShiftLevel="" IsValid="True" HostId="-2" TemplateName="" TypeName="SendEmail" SendRN="False" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" DestinationTypeCc="User" DestinationType="User" HostName="{x:Null}" Timeout="00:00:00" DisplayName="Send Email" Attachments="" Cc="" Description="Send an email to a user, a group or a duty." Continue="False" DestinationNumberCc="0" Body="<!DOCTYPE HTML PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD HTML 4.0 Transitional//EN">
<HTML><HEAD>
<META content="text/html; charset=windows-1252" http-equiv=Content-Type>
<META name=GENERATOR content="MSHTML 10.00.9200.16721"></HEAD>
<BODY><PRE><PRE><FONT size=4 face=Calibri>User %UserName% has been unlocked.</FONT></PRE></PRE></BODY></HTML>
" To="Admin" ShiftLevelCc="" MessageType="Custom" /> <ns9:ADGetProperty Password="" HostName="AD-Server" DisplayName="AD Get Property" IsValid="True" HostId="-2" Path="DC=Ayehudc,DC=COM" TypeName="ADGetProperty" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Active directory get a user property." TimeInSeconds="0" x:Name="GetUserMobile" Timeout="00:00:00" UserName="" PropertyName="mobile" PropertyDisplay="mobile" ADUserName="%UserName%" /> <ns10:SendSMS Channel="SMS" TimeInSeconds="0" Subject="" DestinationNumber="0" DisplayName="Send SMS" ShiftLevel="" IsValid="True" TemplateNumber="0" TemplateName="" TypeName="SendSMS" SendRN="False" x:Name="SMS_User" Timeout="00:00:00" DestinationType="User" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Send SMS to a user, a group or a duty." Continue="False" Body="Your Active Directory user has been unlocked." To="%GetUserMobile%" MessageType="Custom" /> </IfElseBranchActivity> <IfElseBranchActivity x:Name="User_Not_Locked"> <ns6:ReturnValue Value="False" IsValid="True" x:Name="returnValue5" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" ConditionName="" UseBranchWhenTimeout="True" UseStoredValue="True" ConditionType="" DisplayName="Return Value" Formula="=Equals(&&&,False)" Description="Use a returned value of a previous activity." ConditionNumber="-1" UseCustomeCondition="False" Type="StoredValue" TypeName="ReturnValue" /> <ns11:Continue DisplayName="Continue" x:Name="continue2" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" IsValid="True" TypeName="Continue" Description="Continue the current workfow or branch" /> </IfElseBranchActivity> </IfElseActivity> </SequenceActivity> </WhileActivity> </SequentialWorkflowActivity>
WorkflowInfo.Details: This process checks if every user in a specific OU is locked, and if it is  the user is unlocked and an email is sent to the user.
